text:
#COVID19 + #climatechange highlighted the need for access to cooling in #India to ensure thermal comfort, food security & timely delivery of the #vaccine to all, while abiding by the commitments to the #MontrealProtocol. 

Read the blog by @AEEE_India: https://t.co/xWfI82OAwB https://t.co/M3wVtEZYg8
